One word to describe this game... Revolutionary.

At first you dont expect much from this game but this is the game that helped shaping story modes in games  and it was very innovative for the time its pretty so its a good deal but i would snatch the game with the whole valve pack on a sale then you wouldnt need to buy everything seperatly
The first true classic of Valve; HL1 is both a polished work of art yet so far behind in some basics that Valve has now perfected. Regardless, it's nice to see where it all started.

Molto bello. Incentrato principalmente sul gameplay, non trascura la trama che è ben costruita. Il gioco è davvero divertente e frenetico. Non ti stacchi più dallo schermo.
L'unico difetto che ho trovato è che in alcuni punti è difficile capire come proseguire nel gioco, siccome il gameplay richiede anche piccole fasi di esplorazione. Con un po' di pazienza, però, si riesce a procedere nell'avventura.
Очень классная игра! В игре классный сюжет, гемплей. 10/10

its half-life why are you looking at the reviews? buy the damn game
Just one of my best favorite Valve's game.

A really old shooter that still holds up in terms of story and gameplay even tho not on the graphics side but is revolutionary for the creation of mods that later came out to be amazing franchises such as Counter strike and Team Fortress.
One negative thing I'd say is that some levels sometimes drags on for too long and everything else is top notch in my opinion.
Bueno que decir, una nostalgia terrible !!!
fun. got to shoot a lot of aliens. also the occasional man.
I honestly genuinely enjoy speedrunning this game. An ultimate classic, and anyone should pick it up due to it's history and amazing story.

剧情真的很好
但是画面太老了 不能玩太久
The VALVE game that started all VALVE games since 1998, my favorite year.

While there are very innovative fps for their time as wolfenstein or quake Half life was a game that broke all the schemes, being the first game in 3D as focused on the plot as in the action, to the point of starting with a 5 minute intro where we can not do more than observe the environment to get fully into the game and understand that this was not going to be just shots and dead, not to mention that until it starts everything has a good time. The plot is what I value most of the game since it is not only an excellent plot but it is told in a special way, without revealing anything that the protagonist does not know or by getting up to date at all times, but giving us enough clues in each scenario and dialog to find the meaning. What caught my attention the most in his time is his excellent AI that although it would be laughable, it was undoubtedly very successful in his time, especially the military ruthless enemies, who did not just shoot in one place but also they organized and were able to deceive us even or adopt different attitudes if we hurt them enough (such as running away, or planting a bomb and running, joining the group); the game was very focused on each npc had its particularities in the AI, as the smell system bullchicken or the fear of scientists.
Great but it shows it's age fr fr

Un juego memorable, para tener en la biblioteca y jugarlo de tiempo en tiempo. Ademas que su multijugador es justo para juntar unos amigos y pasar el rato en una lucha constante. Una calificacion muy buena le daria.
Прошёл не на бхопе, и собственно я ловил экстаз.
No sera de lo mas divertido hoy en dia, pero para su momento fue toda una revolucion

un clasico para matar el rato pero que buenos recuerdos

I got this for my 17th birthday this year and I can honestly say its one of the most masterful and immersive games I've ever played. Even with its dated graphics (that I still like as I like how 90's games' polygons look), the game manages to absorb me in ways many games now can't. From the huge levels and almost complete uninterrupted control of Gordon Freeman at all times, the game just demands you keep playing. I highly recommend this game and the other Half-Life games even to people who aren't fans of FPS's (I myself don't play many shooters, but there are exceptions, this being one). Overall, 10/10, the second greatest game I've ever played.
Un clasico uwu muy bueno con amigos
